title: Marketplace Money for Friday, June 20, 2014
teaser: This week on Marketplace Money, guest host David Lazarus of the LA times and Emily Bazar explain how to navigate your health care bill.  Comedian Carol Leifer discusses what she learned from her father about spending small and dreaming big. David answers your personal finance questions. Cameron Huddleston, a contributing editor at Kiplinger.com, talks about what to watch out for in the latest set of criminal schemes. Personal finance writer Kristen Wong of the LifeHacker blog Two Cents joins David to talk about how to trick ourselves into being smarter money managers. And au revoir Marketplace Money, next week you'll hear Marketplace Weekend, a new show about the economy and your money. Lizzie O'Leary, the new host of Marketplace Weekend, talks about the show's launch.
